description: This is a market on predicting what Kamala Harris will say during her live stream with Oprah.

markets.description:
Kamala Harris and Oprah are scheduled to conduct a livestream event on September 19.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Harris says "Mark Robinson" during their appearance on the live stream. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

If this candidate does not appear at this event, or if the event is otherwise cancelled or delayed beyond September 19, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be the video of the speech.
markets.question: Will Kamala Harris say "Mark Robinson" during Oprah livestream?

markets.description:
Kamala Harris and Oprah are scheduled to conduct a livestream event on September 19.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Harris says "nazi" during their appearance on the live stream. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market.

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms will NOT count.

Compound words will count as long as "nazi" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to one who espouses the beliefs and policies of the German Nazis, or something that pertains to Naziism.

If this candidate does not appear at this event, or if the event is otherwise cancelled or delayed beyond September 19, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be the video of the speech.
